revised_title: Edward Heron-Allen: A Life Dedicated to Scientific Enquiry
tldr: Edward Heron-Allen was a versatile and persistent scientific enquirer who contributed to various fields, including Foraminifera research, paleontology, and bibliography. He was especially interested in the arenaceous Foraminifera and their ability to show purpose and intelligence in their arrangements. Heron-Allen collected and studied numerous publications and specimens, eventually donating his extensive Foraminifera collection and library to the British Museum (Natural History). He also authored several books and articles, including "Selsey Historic and Historic" and "Barnacles in Nature and in Myth."
